name: tsugumi
description:
i went through something awful yesterday and i have been thinking a lot about xxxholic and am now working on something that makes me smile and makes me think, as well, about iterations of the universe, and how...i want to present an iteration of one that is very visibly and undeniably tethered to "the reality everyone knows" which, not "everyone" knows, but pretends to (the consensus reality)

so, enjoy sengreen and lin xue being clowns
